name: Ten Harbor
role_in_state: Primary maritime gateway and ritual-augury port
culture_adjustments: stronger tide-festival calendar tied to harbor silt cycles
apprenticeship often spent aboard merchant crews as well as guild yards
dockside shrines and augurs more integrated into daily commerce
practical seamanship vocab dominates Coastal Tongues variants
constraints: ritual-augury depends on scarce imported reagents
limited deep-water berths due to silting
notes: strategic node for State_10 longshore commerce
local augurs sell pilotage services to inbound fleets
